data.name: Dagada's story Demo
data.detailed_description:
Dagada's Story is a 2D puzzle-platformer game set in a colorful retro-style world with an emphasis on puzzles and exploration. Solve ancient mysteries, climb dangerous snow-capped mountains and discover a great story with lovable characters in this Mario, Celeste and Limbo inspired world.


  • Carefully jump and climb your way through dangerous mountain trails
  • Solve numerous puzzles to discover all the secrets of the world
  • Find your way and explore beautiful places that invite you to contemplate


The story takes place on a planet of ice where a strange grey smoke covers the sky, modifies the climate and gradually destroys all forms of life. Despite this terrible catastrophe, a small tribe of adorable little beings survives in this hostile environment: the Daoudaounes. Dagada and his new friends will have to help each other to avoid a future cataclysm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
